column4: Can anyone here help me with samba?  the ubuntu site is confusing me.
what's up?
Thanks,  I am trying to create a username and password for all of my smb shares
windows will not connect if I don't have a username and password
would you rather not have a password?
yeah
i thought that might be the case
I can connect with other non windows devices with no trouble
I have been told that windows NEEDS a username and password, or it wont ever attempt
did you edit /etc/samba/smb.conf?
not true, i got it to work
I  have only changed the work group
I  have XP by the way...
ok you need to edit a setting in /etc/samba/smb.conf
there is a section in that file called authentication
under that line if you see a line that says security = user i want you to place a # in front of that line
under that line if you see a line that says security = user i want you to place a # in front of that line
if you don't see that line or if it already has a # that's ok
then once you take care of that add security = share and save the file
thats already been done.
okay I will try that
";   security = user"
is currently what I see, is ; a blocked charactor
put a # in front of it
